text: Jerry O'Neil (born March 28, 1956) is an American retired NASCAR driver from Auburn, New York. He competed in 16 NASCAR Winston Cup Series races in his career between 1990 and 1993. His last start in Winston Cup was in 1993, at the second Charlotte event. O'Neil was also a frequent competitor in the Automobile Racing Club of America (ARCA). ==Motorsports career results== ===NASCAR=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
